name: MaskGun Multiplayer FPS
description:
MaskGun is a real-time online Multiplayer 3D First Person Shooter built for Mobile Devices

Features
**********************************
► Easy and simple Controls: easy to learn and play the game and rise up the leaderboards
►Skill based PVP Battles with 3 Game modes - DeathMatch, Team DeathMatch and Bomb Defusal Mode.
►Use our RealTime Friends System to Play with Your Friends when they are Online
►Join your friends Battle in one Click
►Free to Play as much as you want, no energy system
►Customize Gun, Armors and Masks
► Six new Maps including Diwali Yard, Ryokan, GhostTown and LightHouse
► Complete Missions to Level Up

Custom Game Engine
**********************************
Game now plays well with all Devices including devices with smaller app size and memory footprint.
Metal support and better Battery consumption
Watch the preview video now to see real gameplay of 5-vs-5 multiplayer battles.
(Yeah, it really looks like the screenshots.)

Feedback
**********************************
Thanks for your awesome response and feedback.

Keep those comments coming and send us an email to maskgun@junegaming.com
